typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		emp_id as integer '000',
		emp_name as string,
		{ emp_sal} as integer '000',
		emp_location as string,
		emp_deptID as integer '000'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(emp_deptID),
	SumOfSalary = sum({ emp_sal})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['empDetails_Salary.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		emp_deptID,
		SumOfSalary
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		partNo as string,
		PartDesc as string,
		Division as string,
		Plant as string,
		MRP as string,
		PRICE as string,
		GST as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(Division == '11',
	Division == '22',
	disjoint: false) ~> Split@(DIVISION11, DIVISION22, OTHERS)
Split@DIVISION11 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MaterialMaster_Division11.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
Split@DIVISION22 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MaterialMaster_22.json'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
Split@OTHERS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MaterialMaster.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink3

source(output(
		EMP_ID as integer,
		NAME as string,
		DEPT_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EMP
source(output(
		DEPT_ID as integer,
		DEPT_NAME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DEPT
EMP, DEPT exists(EMP@DEPT_ID == DEPT@DEPT_ID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EXITS.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		firstName as string,
		lastName as string,
		gender as string,
		age as string,
		address as (State as string, country as string, ZIP as string),
		skills as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(skills),
	mapColumn(
		skills,
		firstName,
		gender,
		age
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DEPT_ID as string,
		DEPT_NAME as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['flat.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMP_ID as integer,
		emp_name as string,
		emp_sal as integer,
		emp_location as string,
		dept_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		Dept_id as integer,
		dept_name as string,
		dept_location as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 lookup(source1@dept_id == source2@Dept_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LOOKUPEXAM
LOOKUPEXAM select(mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEEID = EMP_ID,
		NAME = emp_name,
		emp_sal,
		emp_location,
		dept_id_EMP = source1@dept_id,
		Dept_id = source2@Dept_id,
		dept_name,
		dept_location
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		emp_name as string,
		gender as string,
		skills as string,
		address as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source(output(
		emp_name as string,
		gender as string,
		skills as string,
		address as string,
		ParseSkill as (skill1 as string, skill2 as string, skill3 as string),
		ParseAddress as (state as string, country as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 parse(ParseSkill = skills ? (skill1 as string,
		skill2 as string,
		skill3 as string),
	format: 'delimited',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	columnDelimiter: '|',
	nullValue: '') ~> Parse1
Parse1 parse(ParseAddress = address ? (state as string,
		country as string),
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> Parse2
Parse2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		max_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	procedureName: 'sp_get_maxID',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	resultSet: true,
	format: 'procedure',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MAXID
source(output(
		Name as string,
		country as string,
		Active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
MAXID, source1 join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 keyGenerate(output(STATEID as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(SrNo = toInteger(max_ID+STATEID),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		STateID as integer,
		Name as string,
		country as string,
		Active as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		STateID = SrNo,
		Name,
		country,
		Active
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPID as integer,
		EMPNAME as string,
		DEPT as string,
		GENDER as string,
		SALARY as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 window(over(DEPT),
	desc(SALARY, true),
	DenseRank = denseRank(),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DEPT_ID as string,
		DEPT_NAME as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['window_Dense.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		emp_id as integer,
		emp_name as string,
		{ emp_sal} as string,
		emp_location as string,
		emp_deptID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(emp_id),
	each(match(name!='emp_id'), $$ = last($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['RemoveDuplicates.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		emp_id,
		emp_name,
		{ emp_sal},
		emp_location,
		emp_deptID
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Name as string,
		country as string,
		Active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Name as string,
		country as string,
		Active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		partNo as string,
		PartDesc as string,
		Division as string,
		Plant as string,
		MRP as string,
		PRICE as string,
		GST as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['unionData.json'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		partNo as string,
		PartDesc as string,
		Division as string,
		Plant as string,
		MRP as string,
		PRICE as string,
		GST as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(Division == '11',
	Division == '22',
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DIVISION11, DIVISION22, Others)
ConditionalSplit1@DIVISION11 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TPartsMaster_11.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@DIVISION22 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TPartsMaster_22.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@Others sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		partNo as string,
		PartDesc as string,
		Division as string,
		Plant as string,
		MRP as string,
		PRICE as string,
		GST as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['TPartsMaster_75.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink3

source(output(
		EmP_ID as integer,
		NAME as string,
		DEPT as string,
		SALARY as double,
		LOCATION as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 pivot(groupBy(DEPT),
	pivotBy(LOCATION),
	{} = sum(toInteger(SALARY)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['pivot.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EmP_ID as integer,
		NAME as string,
		DEPT as string,
		SALARY as long,
		LOCATION as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EMP
EMP pivot(groupBy(DEPT),
	pivotBy(LOCATION),
	{} = sum(toInteger(SALARY)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PivotEMP
PivotEMP sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
